statements.select:
SELECT A.* , B.* FROM T_DOBJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DLIBRARY B ON A.OID = B.OID
A.Type = #Type#
A.OID = #OID#
A.Name LIKE CONCAT('%',#Name#,'%')
A.Description LIKE CONCAT('%',#Description#,'%')
B.KorNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#KorNm#,'%')
B.FromOID = #FromOID#
B.IsUse = #IsUse#
AND A.DeleteDt IS NULL
statements.update: UPDATE T_DLIBRARY SET KorNm = #KorNm# ,IsUse = #IsUse# ,Ord = #Ord# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.* FROM T_DCODELIBRARY A WHERE 1=1
A.OID = #OID#
A.Description LIKE CONCAT('%',#Description#,'%')
A.KorNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#KorNm#,'%')
A.FromOID = #FromOID#
A.IsUse = #IsUse#
A.Code1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#Code1#,'%')
A.Code2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#Code2#,'%')

SELECT ISNULL(MAX(OID),0) + 1 AS OID FROM T_DCODELIBRARY
